3: Message has been sent via the nearest relay point.
……Ayla
...I'm sorry.
Looks like this will be my last message.
But at least my 'Tempest' has reached you, right?
Ayla, I once told you why I wanted to become a Construct...
'Our paths would be rectified if we could portray the world as it truly is.'
I still believe in it.
I'm sorry for being selfish.
I'm sorry, Ayla. I chose my own path without letting you know...
Even when I know we are so similar.
Another Corrupted falls to the ground from Selena's attack.
So I'm not alone.
I always feel that you are next to me, fighting together.
Looks like this is the end.
My final solo...
Time to... call it curtains.
Adios... (Goodbye...)
...Mi amor (...My dear friend)
